author: elena
msg: According to the latest Namespace in XML erratum no other prefix other that
"xmlns" can be bound to the xmlns namespace.
DOM L3 createAttributeNS() throws an exception in this case.

author: elena
msg: Update XNI samples following a change to XMLDocumentHandler/XMLDocumentSource

author: elena
msg: XMLDocumentSource.getDocumentHandler. This change allows us to modify the pipeline dynamically,
in particular we now remove DTDValidator if no DTD grammar is available. This change improves parsing
performance by 7%-12% for medium size files (100k-1M).

author: elena
msg: only xmlns prefix can be bound to the xmlns namespace

author: elena
msg: Remove tests for invalid nodes, i.e. DOM Level 1, non xmlns prefix bound to the xmlns namespace, etc.
